issue.title: [C++][Docs] Substrait Usage in Acero
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17210](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17210). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, the main `ExecNode`s are supported in consuming Substriat plans in Acero with basic functionality. There are pending improvements. Also the otherway, the Acero execution plan must be able serialize using Substrait. This feature is currently being implemented. These features must be documented with a set of examples in using Substrait with Acero.
